#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <cstring>

#define MAX 10000

//#define DEBUG 1

int main() {
	int t;
	scanf("%d\n", &t);
	char* a;
	char* b;
	a = (char*)malloc(MAX + 2);
	b = (char*)malloc(MAX + 2);
	int len;
	while (t--) {
		//scanf( "%s\n%s\}", a, b);
		gets(a);
		gets(b);
		//if (DEBUG) printf( "a='%s', b='%s'\n", a, b);
		len = strlen( a );
		for ( int i = 0; i < len; ++i ) {
			if ( a[i] == ' ' ) continue;
			a[i] = b[ a[i] - 'A' ];
		}
		printf( "%s\n", a);
	}
	free(a);
	free(b);
	return 0;
}
